title: go get on windows XP 32 bits : "unsupported GOARCH x86"
body:
by **milak.mlk**: 
Hello,
I just downloaded the last windows weekly version : 2012-02-07. In my code, I use
openpgp but it has been removed. I tried for the first time, "go get". I
downloaded mercurial to have the hg command and then a new error came :
"unsupported GOARCH x86"

What steps will reproduce the problem?
1.go get code.google.com/p/go.crypto/openpgp

What is the expected output?
A success package installation

What do you see instead?
unsupported GOARCH x86

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?
8g but here it is go that has problem

Which operating system are you using?
windows XP 32 bits

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)
go version : weekly.2012-02-07 +52ba9506bd99

Please provide any additional information below.
